commitments.commitment: Demurrage will be available in the Lithos testnet client
commitments.quote: we'll have demurrage in the Lithos testnet client as well

commitments.commitment: More news about the testnet will be released
commitments.quote: We'll have more news coming out soon about the testnet

key_facts.fact: Lithos testnet is getting close to coming out
key_facts.speaker: Cheese Enthusiast

key_facts.fact: Lithos is a decentralized mining pool protocol that allows miners to connect to smart contract-based mining pools
key_facts.speaker: Cheese Enthusiast

key_facts.fact: When first starting mining using the Lithos client, difficulty parameter will be automatically set based on hash rate
key_facts.speaker: Cheese Enthusiast

key_facts.fact: Demurrage will automatically be collected by the Lithos client
key_facts.speaker: Cheese Enthusiast

key_facts.fact: MEV and transaction selection aren't the biggest priorities and won't be integrated into the UI and testnet
key_facts.speaker: Cheese Enthusiast
